entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Failure tracing\\eventpipe\\enabledisable\\enabledisable\\enabledisable.cmd #83359
  • How to force System.Text.Json deserializer to throw an exception when property is missing in JSON? #83357
  • Existing behavior of AndAlso and OrElse in DLR is wrong #83350
  • Loop condition vs initial guard check impacts bounds checking #83349
    8.0.0
  • Intermittent build break caused by test-watchdog project #83346
  • performance issue with SetTag in Activity with large number of tags #83345
    Future
  • Can't build in an ARM64 Windows machine, fails in crosscompontents step #83343
  • Can make http2 request from a Android device #83344
  • [API Proposal]: SubStream #83340
    8.0.0
  • IPv6 multicast, multicast group joins on not selected network adapter with .net SDK installed #83336
  • jitstress-random-libraries: Assertion failed 'addr->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #83333
    8.0.0
  • jitstress-random: Assertion failed 'node->OperIsLIR()' #83332
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] Remaining AOT Linux x86-64 perf issues after RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> #83330
    Future
  • [mono] Change bound delegates dependency of bound_method + delegate_type to use just delegate_type #83329
    8.0.0
  • Do async state machines ever have Equals/GetHashCode called? #83323
  • Test failure JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #83320
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT type instantiation sharing #83318
    Future
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_InstanceExists_Static #83317
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Matrix4x4Tests.Matrix4x4CreateShadowTest02 #83316
  • Add validation to SetHWIntrinsicId to help validate correctness #83315

Closed

  • Roslyn analyzer assembly loading with NativeAOT #83355
  • Native AOT classlib compiles with [DLLImport° as cheating dynamic library #83353
  • Remove System.Drawing dead code #22394
    Future
  • Stream Facade Pattern and Stream enhancements #39601
    Future
  • .NET NativeAOT x64 builds on macOS adds dependency on @rpath/libswiftCore.dylib instead of correct install path #79454
  • Wrong error message formatting for IDX10653 (System.Security.Cryptography) #83347
  • Investigate adjusting herustics for unrolled block copies/initialization #82529
    Future
  • [tvOS] System.Drawing.PrimitivesTest.RectangleTests.RectangleFConversionTest failed #60172
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR tests on Mono runtime : crash running JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_23791/GitHub_23791/GitHub_23791.sh #34385
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR tests on Mono runtime : Failures in GC/API/* tests #35250
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize<T> returns invalid object when called by TypeConverter within AWS Lambda Test Tool #44763
    Future
  • The callback for the Hot Reload MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute does not invoke. #82625
  • AOT - Cannot use System.Reflection on type named `AktifBarkod.AktifPOS.Mobil.EkranDiğer.Ana.AnaPage` #78638
    8.0.0
  • Crash on startup on Android in Release when referencing a class with non ascii characters from a class library #82187
    8.0.0
  • ServiceProvider deadlock when recursive resolving scoped services from another thread #81689
  • The default name of the configuration file is not uniform #83022
  • Make it possible to systematically disable console output. #83283
  • Unhandled exception inside Interop+OpenSsl.AlpnServerSelectCallback causing the process crash #81588
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Add missing 'MadeChanges = true' in gtSplitTree #83360
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolverChain. #83358
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove System.Drawing.Common from runtime #83356
    area-System.Drawing
  • Adding support for Vector512 bitwise operations: And, AndNot, Or, OnesComplement, and Xor #83354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Fix threading startup after emscripten bump #83352
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [NativeAOT] Unify common cases of Array.Copy with CoreCLR #83351
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement HResult swapping for generated COM methods. #83348
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/7.0] Fix special sweep issue for workstation #83342
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #83341
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add property to get owner composite executable #83339
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Override Write(Span) for CryptoStream to clear arrays before returning to pool #83338
    area-System.Security
  • [Mono] Add more binary op intrinsics for ARM64 mini JIT #83337
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [loader] Does find_method_in_class really see null method entries? #83335
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [browser][debugger] Cleanup runtime_ready tests #83334
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Codespaces] Fix prebuild by using newer dotnet sdk #83331
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce number of gen 2 GC under high memory load #83328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Remove VersionSuffix from servicing builds #83326
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • Fix spurious exception while compiling optimized code #83324
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Various jiterpreter optimizations; implement CALL_HANDLER; don't abort for some icalls #83322
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add x86 intrinsics to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: Remove LclVarDsc::lvExactSize and LclVarDsc::lvSIMDType #83307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `MethodTable.Of` in generated valuetype methods #83325
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2133979 #83240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Constant folding for RuntimeInformation.IsOSPlatform(OSPlatform) #83308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Shared helpers for creating framework-dependent/self-contained apps in host tests #83291
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Unify unroll limits in a single entry point #83274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the dotnet (1) man page #78229
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • replace redhawk with nativeaot #79217
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83273
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Clean up the delegate ctor code. #83288
  • [mono][jit] Adding more arm64 SIMD operations, SIMD codegen with instruction table. #83094
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Override all write/flush methods on NullTextWriter #83293
    area-System.IO
  • [Mono] Fix address data emitted in the MonoProfilerGCRoots ETW event #83284
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove VersionSuffix from servicing builds #83311
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix culture-specific string comparisons in EventSource #83319
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

Updated

  • JIT: Remove "add copies" phase #83310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new MemoryExtension.Replace(src, dst, ...) overload #83120
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83303
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0][mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83302
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Stop relying on type handles in CSE #83306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, Future
  • Try to get more info about a named mutex creation failure #83186
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, Future
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Optimize `x < 0` and `x >= 0` #83176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use IAttributeOperation for our attribute-based analyzers #83239
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][mono] Disable DoublinkList/dlstack tests #83268
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug CI #83266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Test out new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ObjectFactory should verify against a null serviceProvider #82739
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add intrinsics for BitOperations #82827
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Another attempt to fix stress tests #83211
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Remove lvaPInvokeFrameRegSaveVar #83309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default #82445
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Produce IL3000 and IL3001 from NativeAOT compiler #83253
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce duplicity in GVM analysis #83250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Packaging: Would it be possible to use a custom location for dotnet SDK runtimes and versioned components? #31160
  • Updating to 0.9.0-beta.23127.3 gives stack dump #31168

Closed

  • Pound Sign/Hashtag in Response File Breaks Deployments #30759
  • [Pack] NU1102 errors occur when running command “dotnet pack --runtime win10-x64” #30654
  • Unable to install any dotnet tool #30961
  • Wrong version number under "Installed Apps" #30993
  • Why does AutoGenerateBindingRedirects produce a config file with multiple assemblyBinding elements? #31157
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64]On VS 17.6 preview 3 which carries net 8 preview 2 SDK, running web project failed in CLI. #31114

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup and gen api should not reference internal type attribute argument #31158
    Area-Infrastructure
  • WebAssembly SDK #31154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.10.0 to 19.11.1 in /eng/dependabot #31152
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.10.0 to 19.11.1 in /eng/dependabot #31151
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • [Breaking Backport] Restore Console Encoding upon Exit #31077
    Area-CLI
  • [Forward Port] Restore Encoding for the .NET SDK upon Exit #31101
  • Allow hashtag in response files #31167
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31148
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Document for breaking changes, Area-NetSDK
  • Split static web assets SDK from the Razor SDK #31079
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add tests for the operation(install/uninstall/update package) when global settings file is corrupted #30970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30972
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30973
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31135
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `NotNullIfNotNull` does not flow when using delegates as method groups. #67288
  • Incorrect error message when accessing private protected class members from a friend assembly outside of derived class when using unsigned assemblies #67285
  • Compiler erroneously allows pointer to be used within a type-argument in a using-alias #67281
  • Missing type arguments on method invocation with more than one type parameter produce unexpected syntax tree #67277
  • Error squiggles do not appear for Compilation End analyzers in Full Solution Analysis mode #67276

Closed

  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers` should have `PrivateAssets="all"` #67274
  • How to create collapsible DiagnosticDescriptor? #67272

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove document from lsp misc workspace when it is found in normal workspace #67289
    Area-IDE
  • Do not use the Lsp-Misc workspace in VS scenarios #67287
    Area-IDE
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Disallow pointers inside generic type-arguments unless in an unsafe context (in C#12 and beyond). #67282
    Area-Compilers
  • Change the LOC target branch to 17.6 #67279
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Better parser error recovery when encountering a open generic name. #67278
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix up local/non-local diagnostic classification in analyzer driver #67275
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Add information to help us determine which misc workspace a file belongs to. #67286
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [Infra] Create -vs-deps branches #67284
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #67280
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67290
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Compute TextChange based on syntax instead of text #67120
    Area-IDE
  • Try add committed Suggestion item to completion MRU #64586
    Area-IDE
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to one upstream ingestion feed #67263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make Document Outline computation and update asynchronous. #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #67082
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers
  • Delay ref safety analysis of placeholder replacements #67110
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC telemetry improvements #67178
    Interactive-EnC
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Don't show expanded items when filter text length <2 #67049
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Analyzer driver fixes for span-based analysis #67255
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Implement support for captured Primary Constructor parameters in EE when portable PDB is used. #67266
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Rebuild fixes #67240
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix nullability warnings in projects targeting netstandard2.0 #47179
  • Allow rendering components to specific DOM node outside DOM hierarchy like React.createPortal #47178
  • Perf improvement: single_query #47177
  • QuickGrid has a race condition with disposal during init #47173
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Allow to use solution variables in .cshtml files #47172
  • In the core, why is there only ActionNameAttribute and no ControlNameAttribute #47171
  • UseRazorSourceGenerator breaks .NET Maui Blazor App projects #47169

Closed

  • DateTimeOffset modelbinding from form is always set to utc in net7 #45338
    8.0-preview2
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextSansFilter #47170
  • Receiving r.arrayBuffer is not a function with InputFile component on iOS 12.5.6 #47116
  • [QuickGrid] Reevaluate the number of rows on the last page of a Virtualized QuickGrid #47139
  • [QuickGrid] Don't use scoped CSS for QuickGrid.razor #47140
  • [QuickGrid] Consider using reflection to avoid having to box every value (PropertyColumn Format). #47141
  • Refreshing a page (F5) Fails to load when using URL with Guid & double data type #47149
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #47154
  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM breaks when using UsePathBase #46674
  • MAUI Blazor CSS Isolation not working after Publishing to Azure App Service (Linux) #46723
  • AppName.styles.css file has incorrect b- class identifiers #46940
  • IHttpContextAccessor, HttpContext and other related classes not working as expected. #47041
  • Can't serve valid blazor webassembly from Docker #47167

PullRequests

Created

  • Move SegmentWriteStream to shared resource #47180
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update service worker templates to prevent index.html being served when an offline resource is requested. #47168
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Include verb in gRPC JSON transcoding swagger path #47165
    area-grpc
  • Enable nullability in RDG and fix warnings #47144
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • [release/7.0] Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46687
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0.5
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23159.20 #47174
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • [release/7.0] Fix verb in route template with gRPC transcoding #47162
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #47163
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Issue 33368, Solution to resolve "System.InvalidOperationException" inside "HandleForbiddenAsync" method. #47089
    area-security, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Guidance on using PerfView/other perf visualization tools. #2911
    7.0.0
  • Dotnet-Counters reports higher Gen 2 Size, than GC Heap Size #3730
    8.0.0
  • Native and Managed Heap Improvements #3736
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Reimplement !dumpheap and !verifyheap in C# #3738
    enhancement

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Inner circle won't draw on templated RadioButton that started unselected. #13896
  • [Windows] Clicking on the ellipse of a templated RadioButton doesn't work on WinUI #13895
  • Images do not layout correctly in iOS #13893
  • Changing properties of Shape.Stroke brush does not update app rendering #13891
  • iOS simulator Accelerometer Microsoft.Maui.ApplicationModel.FeatureNotSupportedException #13889
  • i dont have MAUI when i want to select workload #13887
  • CollectionView does not highlight selected item on Android but works on windows #13885
  • Mac catalyst target cannot be removed from project Properties page #13884
  • error: Failed to load AOT module 'Microsoft.Maui.Graphics' while running in aot-only mode #13882
  • Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech Crash on iOS #13878
  • Compiled Binding to Array.Count provides no result #13872
    Backlog
  • VisualState for ImageButton doesn't change from Pressed state back to Normal or Focused #13870
    Backlog
  • Elements disappear CollectionView with BindableLayout with ScrollView horizontal #13868
    Backlog
  • Android and iOS: BackgroundColor and TextColor properties are not getting applied for Button if they are set based on Converters #13865
  • Image crashes with pictures from bytearray which is created with DrawingView or isn't refreshed with byte[0] - Only on Android #13859
    Backlog
  • The image read by the ImageSource.FromFile method is not reflected in Image.ImageSource. #13858
    Backlog
  • MAUI - XAML - Object reference not set to an instance of an object - reproducable, not same as #8249 #13856
    Backlog

Closed

  • FlexLayout render error after update VS 2022 17.3.0 #9325
    Backlog
  • ScrollView and VerticalStackLayout do not resize themselves on iOS #8820
  • App crashes on startup when R8 shrinker is set in Maui - Release mode #13413
    Backlog
  • Publish to Windows error if using referenced Maui Class Library #13869
  • Collectionview with entry box flickering on data entry and keyboard closure shows the last page #13871
    Backlog
  • Can't Disable MAUI Blazor - Android WebView Streached Overscroll / Bounse effect which feels non native #13852
    Backlog
  • Command binded with menu bar in .net 6 not executing #13845
  • [Feature Request] Option to change text in entry property net maui #13854
  • CollectionView is displaying incorrect images #8676
    .NET 8 Planning
  • OnnxRuntime GPU does not work in MAUI project #13860
  • MAUI Cannot Interact With HID SmartCards on MacOS #13855
  • Object reference not set to instance of an object in ShellToolbarAppearanceTracker.SetColors #13861
  • When I Capture a photo the second time the camera does not open #13477
  • RC1 - App crash when FilePicker selects large files #6503
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure WrapperView children become visible when it does #13894
  • [Actions] Do not execute the ping for all branches. #13892
  • [Actions] Ensure that strings are valid in json. #13890
  • [net8.0] [vs-workload] Use variable to control VSMAN name #13888
  • The MapPage in the sandbox is not needed #13880
  • Move Android Initialize call to Mappers #13879
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #13875
  • Revert "Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus (#12890)" #13874
    area/controls 🎮
  • [vs-workload] Use variable to control VSMAN name #13873
    area/setup 🪄
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Security.SecurityCrypto from 1.1.0-alpha03 to 1.1.0-alpha05 #13867
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview2] [vs-workload] Use variable to control VSMAN name #13881
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview1] [vs-workload] Use variable to control VSMAN name #13877
  • Disable caching when loading images from streams #13111
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `VisualElement.Clip` #13806
    area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2.1 #13162
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
  • [controls] fix memory leaks in `Page` & navigation #13833
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • FilePicker on Mac Catalyst does not always return the file picked #13814
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix iOS ListView Footer Missing (#13560) #13744
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • Fix next keyboard into a ListView and TableView iOS #13838
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/ListView, control-entry
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext to Border StrokeShape #13793
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Cache the dynamic AppTheme value in Controls (and not Essentials) #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖, area/theme
  • Fix Flyout and TitleView Offset Measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fix Android ListView header / footer gone (#12312) #13712
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Create development path without compatibility projects #13660
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0 to 7.0.1 #13792
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, area/theme
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • [Android] Fixed SwipeItems size dynamically changing the Content Margin #13501
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Fix Picker alignment issues #13516
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • [Android] Fix issue calculating the threshold using SwipeItemViews #13615
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Implement SearchBar CancelButtonColor on Windows #13622
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled on Windows SearchBar #13636
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix controls RTL issues #13672
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix issue updating the Path Data #13816
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Force menu rebuild when window is closed (#10702) #13709
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add NuGet Package README file for EFcore #30467
  • Integer value 0 is not set on INSERT when field has different default value #30463

Closed

  • Explicit comparer on a nullable principal property with a non-nullable dependent property throws #28944
    8.0.0-preview3
  • using entity framework as key storage for .net data protection #30440
  • In efcore 6, Is it possible to generate migration file with table already exists or not condition.( when we run commands) #30428
  • SaveChanges sometimes fails to save added entity in multithread context - is this known/expected? #30375
  • Error when creating a new migration "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: EntityId" #30349
  • Changing log level of DbUpdateConcurrencyException #30429
    8.0.0-preview3
  • Verify No Changes Command #30457

PullRequests

Created

  • Add readme for sql server #30466
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.2 to 13.0.3 #30465
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Debugging for in-memory test failures #30460

Merged

  • Convert when using comparer for non-nullable dependent #30398
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23159.20 #30462
  • Don't log both `SaveChangesFailed` and `OptimisticConcurrencyException` for same event #30445
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.32.0 to 3.32.1 #30417
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Temporary fix for in-memory test failures #30461

Updated

  • Fix to #30410 - JSON: optimize update path for single property element - don't wrap the value in json array #30422

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Preview 3 tarball package contains two NETCore.App shared runtimes #15698

PullRequests

Created

  • Automate template updates into dotnet/installer #15778
  • [7.0.3xx] Automate asp.net template updates into dotnet/installer #15777
  • [7.0.2xx] Automate asp.net template updates into dotnet/installer #15776
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15775
  • Enable bootstrap flow testing in CI #15774

Merged

  • [7.0.1xx] Automate Asp.net template updates in dotnet/installer #15737
  • Enable filtering of tarball extraction #15717
  • Update SB prebuilts tarball version #15773
  • Add VMR sync functionality into dotnet/dotnet's Codespaces #15750

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15767
